title: Siam Sunset (1999 - Australia) comedy
description:
Siam Sunset (1999 - Australia)

Comedy / Romance
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0178022/


6 Award WINS and 8 Award NOMINATIONS

Filmed at Adelaide and Breakaways Reserve and Coober Pedy, South Australia

The married bliss of Perry, an English industrial scientist working on a new shade of red paint, is suddenly shattered when his young wife is killed in a freak accident. Certain he is a magnet for disaster, Perry sets off for Australia. The tour bus proves to be a distinctly second-rate enterprise, and matters are complicated by the presence of fugitive Grace, on the run after ripping off her drug-dealer boyfriend.


Video: DivX6, 576x256, 25.000 fps, 944 Kbps, 01h27m57s
Audio: MP3, 48000 Hz, joint stereo, 116 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
